grimoire.preface: Lyahvi is the magic of the air, of the insubstantial, the invisible, the ethereal, and the illusionary. Lyahvian mages are manipulators of light: reflection, refraction and confusion, with effects faster than the eye and difficult to describe. They are masters of air and other gases, of sound (which travels on the air), and they can summon Asiri and other ethereals to their benefit. The Lyahvi nemesis is earth, represented by the convocation of Fyvria. The essence of Lyahvi is bright, sterile and unliving. Secondary: Peleahn, Savorya Tertiary: Jmorvi, Odivshe Diametric: Fyvria

spell.name: Ablarin's Field
spell.description: The spell is placed upon an object, which may be the caster, another creature or an inanimate object. All sound near that point is muffled, and perception tasks are at +5 difficulty to hear sounds from the target. The spell effects anything within a metre radius of the target point.

spell.name: Darin's Sprite
spell.description: Summons a sapient element of Lyahvi, which appears as a small mote of light, about as bright as a candle flame. The elemental has limited intelligence, but can follow simple instructions. It cannot pass through solid matter, but can travel as much as 25m away from the caster. If it is commanded to travel further than this, then control over it will be lost. It can see and hear, though cannot understand any speech other than its elemental language, and will have difficulty telling mundane creatures apart. All communication with the elemental is speech, in the tongue of the lyahvian element. Opposed Will rolls must be made when the sprite is summoned in order to control it. The sprite will have a will of one.

spell.name: Aeric's Whisper
spell.boost: +10 Message need not be spoken aloud
spell.description: When cast, the caster's voice is carried to a designated spot within line of sight. The voice travels the intervening distance, though in a reasonably tight beam. The spell lasts for one round.

spell.name: Beacon of Isala
spell.description: Causes the air around the target point to glow softly, with as much light as a torch. If the target is an object, then the light will move with that object. Sentients get a will roll to resist the spell if they are made the target. The more powerful incantations of this spell can increase the range of the spell, or the brightness.

spell.name: Crimson Rune
spell.description: The caster traces out shapes on a surface, leaving a glowing mark which can be simple shapes, or complex writing. The runes can be written in the air, or on a solid object.

spell.name: Aeric's Silken Voice
spell.description: Modifies sound making it clearer and generally more pleasant. The upshot is that the target of the spell gets a +5 bonus to skill rolls involving sound, such as speaking, singing or playing a musical instrument.

spell.name: Cloak of Kalaerin
spell.description: Hides an inanimate object, giving -5 penalty to spot it. Normally, the difficulty to spot an object in a room is 15 - 3 x size of the object, higher if viewer is distracted.

spell.name: Hlandor's Flash
spell.description: Causes a bright flash of light, which can blind those looking at it. A perception roll is made at difficulty 20, and if failed, a -5 penalty is suffered to actions for the next minute. Creatures suffer a -5 to the resistance rolls in gloomy conditions, and -10 in dark conditions (due to loss of night vision).

spell.name: Lens of Ikara
spell.description: Shapes the appearance of an object up to size 6 in minor ways. The colour, exact shape or size can be changed, though the basic structure of the object will still be the same. The object can be 50% bigger or smaller (though no larger than size 6). A glass could become a vase, a dog a cat etc. If the object moves, the spell is broken. The change is a visual illusion only - touch, smell or sound is not effected.

spell.name: Globe of Setath
spell.description: Creates a glowing ball of flashing light above the head of the caster. Any within range who looks towards the caster must make a perception roll of 25+ or suffer a penalty to all actions of -10.

spell.name: Prism of Gethan
spell.description: Creates a still, purely optical, illusion. In order to spot that it is an illusion requires a perception x awareness roll of 25 + 1 / 10m of distance, though the fact that it does not move tends to be a give away. The illusion can be of any three dimensional object up to size 6. More powerful castings of this spell may allow the illusion to be animated. The animation must be a simple and repetitive (such as rippling cloak or hair).

spell.name: Sight of Castranel
spell.boost: +80 Can grant ability to touched target
spell.description: Allows the castert to see clearly through air ignoring all weather effects up to the range of the spell. Does not grant ability to see in darkness.

spell.name: Beam of Nolar
spell.description: A blinding, burning beam of light shoots forth from the caster's hand, automatically hitting the specified target within range. If a perception roll of 25+ is not made, the target is blinded for one hour per point failed by. On a fumble, they are blinded permanently. The beam also burns, causing +10 damage.

spell.name: Entora's Mirror
spell.description: Creates an image of an object being touched within range of the spell. Difficulty to spot as an illusion is 40. Can be cast on any inanimate object up to size 12.

spell.name: Light of Aestir
spell.description: Reveals any ethereal, illusionary or invisible objects or creatures as they really are. Sapient creatures get an opposed will roll to resist the effects of this spell, all freestanding illusions are automatically seen through.

spell.name: Wind of Sharis
spell.description: Changes 40,000 litres of air into stale, difficult to breathe, air. 40K litres is about equivalent to a small room. The spell is normally centred on the caster. Higher incantations of this spell can make the air poisonous, which requires a stamina roll of 30+ each round to avoid nausea or sickness, and a -15 penalty.

spell.name: Evardin's Tube
spell.description: Turns an amount of inanimate material etheral, allowing it to be passed through. A tube 2m wide, 10m long can be created.

spell.boost: +25 Caster and specified friends not affected
spell.description: A swarm of dancing, brightly flashing motes are created which swarm around the target point, confusing anyone caught within the area. The area is up to 30m across, and anyone caught within it suffers a -20 penalty to actions.

spell.name: Passage of Lyah
spell.description: The target of the spell is made translucent and semi-ethereal, though this only affects sentient creatures, so no clothing or equipment will be affected along with them. The target has difficulty moving. Normal air resists as if they were swimming in molasses, and maximum movement is agility metres per round. Solid objects, such as walls, can be moved through at about a tenth this speed. The target cannot be easily harmed - sword slashes etc will be fealt as a stinging pain, but actual damage will only be done on a natural roll of 20. Affected targets cannot be larger than the wizard.
